item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Songs from Evanescence
item.description:
Hi !

I'm looking for these songs by Evanescence, in any lossless format, please.

Songs available on Qobuz

Underworld Awakening (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)
1 - Made of Stone (Renholdër Remix)
https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/u...ture-soundtrack-various-artists/r3o8205qlzz4b

Avengers Assemble
9 - A New Way to Bleed (Photek Remix)
https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/avengers-assemble-various-artists/aba4cqo1emksa

Hi-Lo (feat. Lindsey Stirling) - Single
1 - Hi-Lo (feat. Lindsey Stirling)
https://www.qobuz.com/us-en/album/hi-lo-feat-lindsey-stirling-evanescence/g8ylj04lrhupc

_______________________________________________

Not available on Qobuz

- Good Enough [Radio edit 1] (4:35)
- Sweet Sacrifice - Single :
Sweet Sacrifice [Album version] (3:05)
Weight of the World [Live in Tokyo] (3:44)
Sweet Sacrifice [Radio version] (3:03)
- Lost in Paradise [Radio edit] (3:51)
- What You Want [Elder Jepson Remix] (3:21)
- My Heart Is Broken - Single :
My Heart Is Broken [Radio edit] (3:45)
My Heart Is Broken [Rock mix] (4:29)
My Heart Is Broken [Pop mix] (4:02)

I think I found them on some sites, but I can't download them
https://wqwrz.com/46/28/flac-discographies/217417/evanescence-discography-2000-2017-lossless-flac/
https://flacworld.ru/discography-flac/3719-evanescence-diskografija-1998-2021.html
https://losslessflac.ru/alternative/3719-evanescence-diskografija-1998-2021.html


_______________________________________________
​
Thanks in advance for your help
item.author: Cristalex
